TITLE_OBJECTIF: What we do in our everyday life !
DESCRIPTION_OBJECTIF: We actively participate in the life of students, to provide them the best universities lives.
DESCRIPTION_COMMUNICATION: We facilitate communication and information sharing between students and teachers.
DESCRIPTION_SALUTARY: We help students in their life by being with them.
DESCRIPTION_ACTIVITY: We organized various activities to raise the level of students.
DESCRIPTION_FINANCE: We manage the finances alongside the administration of the establishment.
